data.name: SimYard Subtheme: User Highlighting in Chat
data.description: Users' names are highlighted in chat by the primary and secondary colors of their major teams. These can be customized based on feedback. This works independently of all other themes. Names will be added as needed.

data.name: Firefox Search Bar Show Engine Names (Firefox 43+)
data.description:
Firefox 57 or Stylish 3.0 users: Please go to https://www.jeffersonscher.com/gm/search-bar-names.html to install.
Stylish 2.x users: SCROLL DOWN AND USE "ADVANCED STYLE SETTINGS" BEFORE INSTALLATION.

If you have multiple search engine plugins for the same site, having only an icon may be annoying. This style shows a more classic list-style display. Developed and tested on Firefox 43.

To try different options after you install the style, reload the page until you get a green Update button, then you can choose a different option and update to it.

data.name: Steam - Holiday Profile 2014
data.description: The Holiday Profile 2014 is finally here on usertstyles.org! If you have missed the chance to get this profile, or you simply want to use this profile permanently, then here you have it! ❄️ Merry Xmas everyone! Feel free to share it with all your friends! (The Holiday Profile 2019 is now available!) [ Version: 9 | View change logs ]

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥
